rukus.text: Soni chisimu chene twantumisye Musa ni isimosimo Yetu kwisa soni maumboni gakuonechela
Kwa Firiauna ni nduna syakwe, basi wanganyao wakuyiye lilamusi lya Firiauna, sano lilamusi lya Firiauna nganiliwa lyakongoka
Tachalongolela wandu wakwe lisiku lya Kiyama ni kwajinjisya ku Moto, kaje kusakala malo gakwinjisyidwa gakwe
Soni wakuyisyidwe pa awuno (umi waduniya) ni malweso, soni lisiku lya Kiyama (tachikuyisyidwa soni ni malweso), kaje kusakala ntuka wakupedwa wakwe
Syalakwesi nisine mu abali syamisinda syatukunsimbila (mmwe Muhammadi ﷺ), jine mwa jele (misindajo) jachiwela chiimile, nambo jine jasimasiche

Soni nganitwatenda Uwwe lupuso (pakwajonanga) nambo kuti walitesile lupuso achimisyene (pakanila kwao), soni milungu jao ajila jawaliji nkujilumbanjila kunneka Allah nganijakamuchisya chilichose ndema jachaichilile chilamusi cha Ambuje wenu (chakwajonanga), soni nganijajonjechesya ikaweje chonasiko
Soni mwele ni mwaakukwembekanyichisyaga Ambuje wenu pati atite ajikwembekanye misinda kutendaga jili jalupuso, chisimu kakwembekanye Kakwe kakasawaga kakupoteka nnope, kaukali

Chisimu mu yalakweyi mwana chichetelelo kwa awala waakogopa ilagasyo ya Akhera, lyele nilisiku lyatachisonganganyisyidwa ku lyalakwelyo wandu, soni lyele nilisiku lyakutendeledwa umboni (niiwumbe yosope, mwanti ngasichisowa anta chimo)
Lyuwa lyatilichiyika (lisiku lya Kiyamalyo) ngasawecheta mundu jwalijose ikaweje kwa lisosa Lyakwe (Allah), basi mu wanganyao muchiwa mwana wangalumbana ni wambone
Basi awala watachiwa wangalumbana nikuti tachiwa m’Moto, tachikola wanganyao mwalakwemo koloma ni kutenda ngwikwi
Tachilonjela mwalakwemo mugachilonjelela mawunde ni mataka, ikaweje mutachisachila Ambuje wenu. Chisimu M’mbuje gwenu ni Nkupanganya ya jukusaka
Sano awala watachiwa wambone nikuti tachiwa mu Litimbe lya ku Mbepo, tachilonjela mwalakwemo mugachilonjelela mawunde ni mataka, ikaweje mutachisachila Ambuje wenu; (walakweo ni) ntuka wangamala

Basi mmwe nkawa mu kaichila pa yaakuigalagatila wanganyao (yanti nganijiwa milungu jakuona), ngaakugalagatila ikaweje mpela yawatiji pagalagatila achatatiwao kala, soni chisimu Uwwe chitwalipile liunjili lyao mwakwana mwangali kupungusya
